rukus.text: 26|124|yetiya sihamtara bhatr hude sihamtaka kaichila, ‘tomaloke takbaraa aralambana nakaraibane
26|125|‘niscaya ma'i tomalokara babe ejana bisbasta raachula.
26|126|‘Eteke tomaloke allahara takbaraa aralambana karaa arau mora anugatya karaa.
26|127|‘Iyara babe ma'i tomalokara ocarata kono pratidana nibicarao, mora pratidana kerala srstijagatara raba (allaha)ra ocarata.
26|128|‘Tomaloke kiya pratito ucca sthanata ayatha saudha nirmana karaa
26|129|‘arau tomaloke enekai prasadasamuha nirmana karai acha, yeniba tomaloka sthayi.
26|130|‘Arau yetiya tomaloke aghata karaa tetiya sbecchacarai hai aghata karaa.
26|131|‘Eteke tomaloke allahara takbaraa aralambana karaa arau moka anusarana karaa.
26|132|‘Arau tomaloke takbaraa aralambana karaa se'i sattara yijane tomalokaka dana karaiche se'i sakalo bisaya, yibora tomaloke jana.
26|133|‘Teraemi tomalokaka dana karaiche catuspada jantu arau putra santana
26|135|‘niscaya ma'i tomalokara babe eta maha dirasara sastira bhaya karao’.
26|136|Sihamte ka’le, ‘tumi amaka upadesa diya ba nidiya, ubhaye amara babe samana.
26|139|Eteke sihamte te'omka asbikara karaile, phalata ami sihamtaka dhbansa karailo. Niscaya iyata ache nidarsana, kintu sihamtara sarahabhage'i mumina nahaya.
26|140|Arau tomara raba, niscaya te'om mahaparaakramasali, parama dayalu.
